name: mach-punch
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.
